name: Heroes Vs Evils
description:
Hello everyone and welcome to the game of Heroes Vs Evils 
I'm Zaher the developer of this game and you gonna read now a small notes about this game to know how it works.
In this game you have to stand as long as possible against the evils, the more waves you stand the more score you gain,in each new wave you gonna face a new type of enemies
 
First: Game difficulty sittings
This was made to fit all the players experiences and to give the opportunity to challenge yourself by making the game harder.
When you run the game you gonna see a 5 input fields represent the difficulty of this game .

1- Time before enemies attack: this time is like a save time to get your solders ready in the field before enemies start attacking you.
2- Time between each enemy: when the save time finish the enemies will start attacking you one by one and there will be a small period between each one of them and this input filed allows you to control this period of time.
3- Time to start the first wave: after this time a couple of enemies are gonna attack you at once without a period between them and the number of these enemies is considered by the last input field (Number of Enemies in each wave).
When you hear the sound of enemy horn that means troubles are coming and the wave has been started.
4- Time between each wave: after the first wave there gonna be an infinitive number of waves and the time between the last wave and the next wave is considered by this field .
5- Number of Enemies in each wave: this number of enemies is gonna attack you at once when it's time for a wave of enemies to attack as i mentioned above.

Note: be sure that you are entering only real numbers without any letters or other symbols or you gonna get an error message.

Second: The Game Play
When you press the Start button you gonna see a bar contains the solders cards, each card has a cost to create a solder using it, you can simply drag and drop the solder from the bar to the filed and this field is considered as square blocks, in each block you can create one solder.You can not create a solder in a block that contains an enemy 

Characters of the game:

  1. Worker: You gonna start with only 6 gold and this means you need first to create workers to produce gold, you can gather the gold simply by clicking on it when the worker produce it
  2. Sword Man: This character is the cheaper warrior in this game it's lives number = 5
  3. Wizard: This warrior can shoot spells on enemies who are far away from him by 2 blocks or less, and he can hit only one enemy by it's spell and it's lives number = 3
  4. Viking Man: This warrior can stand more damage before he died cause his lives number = 6
  5. Armored Man: This warrior can stand more damage before he died cause his lives number = 7
  6. Spear Man: This warrior can throw spears on enemies who are far away from him by 3 blocks or less and it's spear breaks after hitting 2 enemies but his lives number = 3 so be sure to create him behind of the other solders to not die fast 
  7. Shield Man: This man defenses the other solders like a real hero, he can stand a lot of damage before he died cause he has lives number = 25 which is so useful to defense the other solders
  8. Hero: This man is the hero of the battle, he is the strongest sword carrier cause he has lives number = 9
  9. Knight: The most powerful warrior in this game he can hit enemies who are far away from him by 2 blocks or less and he has lives number up to 10
  10. Axe Man: He is the stronger warrior who can throw a weapon, this man throws it's axe on enemies who are far away from him by 3 blocks or less, and it's axe does not break until it hits 3 enemies, and he has a lives number = 5
  11. King: He is the leader of the heroes, he is an old man so he can not fight but he can call knights as reinforcements when you want them, the reinforcements can be called simply by clicking on the king, you can only call them once every one minute and to know if you can call them now or not look at the blue bar under the green bar of the king, this blue bar represents how long you have to wait before you can call reinforcements again.There is cannot be more than one king in the field

The Skull Tool: You might want to replace a solder by another one so you can kill any of your solders simply by clicking the skull icon in the solders bar and then click on the solder which you want to kill him, when you finish from the skull tool click the right mouse button to stop using the skull tool

You lose the game when you lose all of your hearts and you lose a heart if one of the enemies passed to the other side of the filed
